name: WanderVR
description: Welcome to WanderVR, a new kind of VR game focusing on pushing how VR can enhance a player's sense of freedom. This includes climbing, gliding, chopping away at the environment, and much more! Wander plans to have interesting and fleshed out ide content as well as a main campaign that stretches across multiple different locations. From flooded ports, ancient deserts, and Neon Cities. I'm incredibly excited to share my game with you all and ill see you in March!
